conversations.content: Rename the lib directory to follow naming convention.
List all sessions created in the last 7 days.
Find all API endpoints missing rate limiting middleware.
Find all database queries using SELECT *.
Update session metadata with the disaster recovery drill results.
Rename the components directory to match the style guide.
Create API pagination best practices documentation.
Find all environment files checked into version control.
Find all files importing deprecated lodash methods.
Create a new folder for API middleware functions.
List all sessions with errors in the last 24 hours.
Update session metadata with the API throttling configuration changes.
Update the backup agent to exclude temporary files.
Delete the workspace for the proof-of-concept that was rejected.
Find all API endpoints returning sensitive data without proper redaction.
Stop the agent that's causing database connection pool exhaustion.
Find all fetch calls without timeout configurations.
Create API OAuth 2.0 implementation guide documentation.
Create a folder for storing API rate limiting configurations.
Rename the scripts directory to tools for consistency.
Find all environment variables used in the codebase.
Update the caching agent to use compression for cached data.
Find all API routes without input validation middleware.
Update session metadata with the microservices migration results.
Find all API endpoints missing request size limits.
Terminate the analytics agent permanently.
Get details about the monitoring agent.
Check if the test-runner agent is currently active.
Get a list of all available agents in the workspace.
